                                                       PdmsDocumentSearchVO searchvo)

        pdmsDocumentIds - list of documentids of type com.metricstream.pdms.search.model.PdmsDocumentId
        limit - the limit
        offset - the offset
        sortBy - sort by options like documentname, effectiveDate etc.
        sortAs - sort as options like ascending or descending
        onlyLatest - current production documents or/and older version documents

        the list of documents of type com.metricstream.pdms.search.model.PdmsDocument
